<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Steadying Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=2972) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 198 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[stone order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

The earth has taught you how to remain unyielding and firm. If you roll a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check made to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on uneven ground composed of earth or rock, you get a critical success instead. As long as you remain on the ground, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DC against attempts to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) you. This bonus also applies to saving throws against spells or effects that would attempt to knock you [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If you're a [rock dwarf](/Heritages.aspx?ID=4), this bonus increases to +3.
name: Steadying Stone
